an6.96:4.3: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ, ariyāyatane paccājāti dullabhā lokasmiṃ, indriyānaṃ avekallatā dullabhā lokasmiṃ, ajaḷatā aneḷamūgatā dullabhā lokasmiṃ, kusale dhamme chando dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an6.96:4.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, channaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
